name: price
desc: The listed price of the apartment (TARGET)

name: area_kitchen
desc: Total kitchen area in the apartment

name: area_living
desc: Total living space area in the apartment

name: floor
desc: Primary building floor of the apartment

name: rooms
desc: Number of rooms in the apartment

name: windows_court
desc: Whether the apartment has windows facing a courtyard

name: windows_street
desc: Whether the apartment has windows facing a street

name: balconies
desc: Number of balconies in the apartment

name: loggias
desc: Number of loggias in the apartment (balcony-like, google it)

name: phones
desc: Number of phone numbers associated with the advert

name: building_id
desc: ID used to map apartments to buildings
